page.title: 02CLUBS
page.content: (SOCIAL) Social clubs are run by the various public houses in the block,the Windmill the Highgate,the Bell and Bottle,and the Lea Gate.Functions include pool/snooker,football and darts. B.N.F.L. runs a social club for its work,open every night between 17.00 and 23.30hrs.The Ladies Club meets weekly in the village hall on Mondays at 1930 hrs. for whist,dominoes,and occasionally beetle drives. (YOUTH) The Youth Club meet each Tuesday in the village hall between 1900 and 2100 hrs for various functions,talks,discos ,etc.,and there is a Youth Club(the Chi-Rho)affiliated to the church. (SPORT) The canal is used for sailing and fishing.A Model Aircraft Club is very active,meeting 3 or 4 times weekly.
